tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate change News around the world
name: Climate-change
title: Climate-change

api_list.name: Get all Newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change18.p.rapidapi.com/newspaper"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change API
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about climate change from all over the world
api_list.code:
